T.query: select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date where e.emp_no < 10500 or s.from_date = '1990-01-01' or e.last_name like 'Alb%' or s.to_date < '1986-01-01' or (e.birth_date > '1965-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%') or ( s.salary > 50000 and s.from_date = s.to_date);

F.query: select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date where e.emp_no < 10500 or s.from_date = '1990-01-01' or e.last_name like 'Alb%' or s.to_date < '1986-01-01' or (e.birth_date > '1964-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%') or ( s.salary > 50000 and s.from_date = s.to_date);

select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date where e.emp_no < 10500 or e.hire_date = '1990-01-01' or e.last_name like 'Alb%' or s.to_date < '1986-01-01' or (e.birth_date > '1965-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%') or ( s.salary > 50000 and s.from_date = s.to_date);

select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date where e.emp_no < 10500 or s.from_date = '1990-01-01' or e.last_name like 'Alb%' or s.to_date < '1986-01-01' or (e.birth_date > '1965-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%') or (s.from_date = s.to_date);

select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date where e.emp_no < 10500 or s.from_date = '1990-01-01' or e.first_name like 'Alb%' or s.to_date = '1986-01-01' or (e.birth_date > '1964-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%') or ( s.salary > 60000 and s.from_date = s.to_date);

select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date where e.emp_no < 10500 or s.from_date = '1990-01-01' or (e.last_name like 'Alb%' and gender = 'M') or s.to_date < '1986-01-01' or (e.birth_date > '1965-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%') or ( s.salary > 50000 and s.from_date = s.to_date);
